[[inst_lui]]
==== LUI

*Syntax:* lui simm, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load Upper Immediate: loads a 20-bit immediate into upper 20 bits of register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lui.svg[LUI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
